name: The New Queen (itch)
description:
Hello, I am The Machinist, and I am creating The New Queen.
The New Queen is a game based on the late middle ages in the region now known as Romania.
Summary:

The year is 1460, you are Adrian III, king of the great kingdom of Thelarius. Your empire is in the middle of a war with Wallachia and your wife just died. While fighting the evil wallachian forces, you find yourself in need of a male heir and someone to take care of your three daughters, so you seek to find a new woman to fill that role, whether she wants it or not.

You will do whatever it takes to save your family and your people. Whatever it takes.
